sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: The battle for solidar in East Ukraine rages on in what has been described as the bloodiest of the war so far.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Further pressure has been heaped on U.S. President Joe Biden after more documents containing classified material are discovered at a second location.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Investigations into Sunday's assault on the Brazilian government are ongoing, as authorities move to hold those responsible to account.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: The head of Turkey's medical association is released from detention after being convicted of spreading terrorist propaganda.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Smoke rises over the cities of Bakhmut and Soledar in East Ukraine, where the ongoing

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: battle for control has been described as the bloodiest of the war so far.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: The fate of Soledar is still unclear, with Russian mercenary group Wagner claiming to control the gateway town, while the Kremlin cautioned against declaring victory prematurely.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Kyiv's border guard service has released images claiming to show Ukrainian forces stopping an advance of Ukrainian troops in the town.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Solidar is important.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: If Russia prevails, it will aid its assault on the strategic Ukrainian city of Bakhmut, which Russia needs in its quest to capture all of the Donbass.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: For more than five months, constant Russian shelling has left the city of Bakhmut in ruins.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Around 70,000 people used to live there. Now only about 10% of the population is left.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Our task is surviving, both the day and the night, explained this resident of Bakhmut.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: That's how I look at it.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: And of course it would be nice to be able to cook some food during the day.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: The city is still holding the ground, thank God.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Bakhmut is a fortress.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: While it remains difficult to see which side is gaining the edge in the region, there is little doubt that there have been heavy losses on both sides.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Russian forces have not captured the entirety of Solida, despite several false Russian claims that the city has fallen and that Bakhmut risks imminent encirclement says the Institute for the Study of War the think tank says Russian forces are up against concerted Ukrainian resistance around Bakhmut quote the reality of block by block control of terrain in Soledad is obfuscated by the dynamic nature of urban combat however and Russian forces have largely struggled to make significant tactical gains in the solid area for months the Institute for the study of war has only observed visual confirmation of Wagner group forces in central Solida as of the 10th of January the strategic importance of Solida is debated but its capture would be significant for two reasons. First it would allow Russian forces to get closer to the regional city of Bachmut and second Russia could use access to solid as deep city like network of salt mine tunnels to penetrate Ukrainian controlled territory. Now the scale of the mines is vast with around 200 kilometers of tunnels at a depth of up to 300 meters and big underground rooms or chambers some of them large enough to stage football matches and symphony concerts. Now the UK defense ministry Senestral leader was close to falling to Russia but added that the Kremlin was, quote, unlikely to take Bakhmut immediately due to Ukraine's stable defense lines. The Institute for the Study of War adds that control of Solida will not necessarily allow Russian forces to exert control over critical Ukrainian ground lines of communications into Bakhmut.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: of communications into Bahmut.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Further pressure has been heaped on U.S. President Joe Biden after more documents containing classified material were reportedly discovered at a second location.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Earlier this week, Biden's lawyers said an initial set of papers had been found at his former office space in Washington.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: The White House says the president had no knowledge of them.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: All right.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Good afternoon, everyone.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: He said he takes classified documents and information seriously.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: He was surprised to learn any records had been found there.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: He doesn't know what was in them.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: He said this, just repeating what the president has said.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: As soon as his lawyers realized these documents were there, they did the right thing and immediately turned them over to the archives.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Republicans have seized on the discovery to scrutinize Biden's handling of sensitive information. The revelations may also complicate the Justice Department's decision of whether to bring charges against former President Donald Trump, who argues that inquiries into his own conduct are akin to corruption.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Brazil's capital was turned into something of a crime scene following anti-government protests

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: that culminated in the storming of official buildings last Sunday. Scientific police looked for evidence inside the country's Supreme Court, and several investigations are now ongoing into who's responsible for a day that shook this country to its core.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: It was a very concrete attack.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: It was an act of vandalism, insanity.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: If you don't like the election results, like I didn't like the 2018 results, but I didn't go vandalizing things.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Supporters of former President Jair Bolsonaro, who refused to acknowledge the election results, are largely believed to have been behind the scenes of chaos that unfolded in Brasilia.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: But some here are skeptical about what they say are lies spread by mainstream media.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Even with Lula in the government, the landless movement as well as homeless people used to do it.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The indigenous demonstrators too.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: There have always been these demonstrations where they broke everything.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: And now they call this anti-democratic and terrorist.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: And so in the past they were also terrorists.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Why didn't they call them that way?

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: And at the time nobody used to be jailed, nobody was investigated.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: This time some 1,500 people have been detained and many remain in police custody.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Authorities have five days to charge them.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Lula's supporters and members of the Workers' Party's former governments are adamant protesters sought to spread chaos and trigger a military intervention and represent the biggest threat to the country's democracy.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Democracy tolerates everything, except acts that seek to exterminate it.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: If we don't act with vigour against those who want to violate democracy, we will lose democracy.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Those responsible must be put behind bars.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Those who acted politically must lose their mandates.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: And apart from a civil responsibility perspective, they must pay with their own money the damage caused to the public patrimony.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: It will take some time until Brazil's authorities and its people process what happened here.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: But they might not have that time, as more anti-government demonstrations have been called for this week.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Anneliese Borges in Brazil's capital, Brasilia, for Euronews.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Hundreds of supporters of the head of Turkey's medical association

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: have welcomed her release from detention, despite being convicted of spreading terrorist propaganda.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Dr. Şebnem Kurov in charge was arrested after calling for an independent investigation into claims that the Turkish military used banned chemical weapons against Kurdish militants in northern Iraq.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: against Kurdish militants in northern Iraq. It is the responsibility of us doctors and those of us fighting for human rights to share whatever the truth is, what we have seen.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: And we should also remember that it is the media's responsibility to relay it to the public.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Fincaci is the latest activist to be convicted under Turkey's broad anti-terrorism laws.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: She was sentenced to two years and eight months in jail on Wednesday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: However, people are rarely imprisoned in Turkey for jail sentences under three years.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: During her trial, she rejected accusations that she engaged in propaganda, arguing that she was just giving her opinion.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: The Turkish government strongly denies using chemical weapons against the PKK.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: The Islamic State group has claimed responsibility for a suicide bomb attack in Afghanistan.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: The blast occurred outside the country's foreign ministry in Kabul.
